text: Hervé Féron (born August 3, 1956 in Luxeuil-les-Bains, Haute-Saône) is a member of the National Assembly of France. He represents the Meurthe-et- Moselle department, is a member of the Socialist Party and of the Socialiste, radical, citoyen et divers gauche parliamentary group. ==References== Category:1956 births Category:Living people Category:People from Luxeuil-les- Bains Category:Socialist Party (France) politicians Category:Deputies of the 13th National Assembly of the French Fifth Republic Category:Deputies of the 14th National Assembly of the French Fifth Republic
title: Hervé Féron
